mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentms.score_import_record (file_name, file_path, term_id, course_id, teacher_id, department_id, operator, status, message, created_at) VALUES (#{record.fileName}, #{record.filePath}, #{record.termId}, #{record.courseId}, #{record.teacherId}, #{record.departmentId}, #{record.operator}, #{record.status}, #{record.message}, #{record.createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name AS fileName, file_path AS filePath, term_id AS termId, course_id AS courseId, teacher_id AS teacherId, department_id AS departmentId, operator, status, message, created_at AS createdAt FROM studentms.score_import_record ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, file_name AS fileName, file_path AS filePath, term_id AS termId, course_id AS courseId, teacher_id AS teacherId, department_id AS departmentId, operator, status, message, created_at AS createdAt FROM studentms.score_import_record WHERE department_id = #{departmentId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
